property.name: text
property.value: This model of the solar system takes liberties with scale to create a meaningful plot. To get accurate proportions, set sunScaleFactor = 1.0 and diameterScaleFactor to orbitScaleFactor. Even then, the minimumDiameter parameter needs to be reasonably large or most planets become invisible.

property.name: text
property.value: NOTE: The planet sizes are accurate relative to each other, except that their diameter is constrained to ensure they remain visible. The orbit sizes are accurate relative to each other. The size of the sun is separately controlled; it is the size relative to the planets multiplied by the sunScaleFactor. The orbit speeds are not accurate.
